item.title: About me
item.author: skojaku@iu.edu (Sadamori Kojaku)
item.description: Sadamori Kojaku (幸若 完壮) Luddy School of Informatics, Computing, and Engineering, Indiana University Bloomington Contact skojaku@iu.edu CV Employment & Education 02/2020-present: Postdoctoral Fellow Indiana University, United States 04/2019-01/2020: Research Associate Kobe University, Japan 04/2016-03/2019: Research Associate (Postdoc) @University of Bristol, UK 09/2015: Ph.d. in Computer science, Hokkaido University, Japan 03/2012: M.A. in Information science, Hokkaido University, Japan Miscellaneous Born in 01/01/1988 Languages: English and Japanese Hobby:
